Class WAVLoader

Loads/stores samples of WAV format

$Header: /cvsroot/marf/marf/src/marf/Storage/Loaders/WAVLoader.java,v 1.10 2003/02/09 16:24:03 mokhov Exp $

Author:
Jimmy Nicolacopoulos
